headline.main: Far From War's Front Lines, Life in Syria Is Still Tough
headline.print_headline: Far From War's Front Lines, Life in Syria Is Still Tough

lead_paragraph: Large parts of Damascus have survived almost six years of conflict in Syria relatively unscarred, but shortages of fuel and electricity, spiraling prices and a lack of jobs mean the lives of its residents are far from unscathed.
snippet: Large parts of Damascus have survived almost six years of conflict in Syria relatively unscarred, but shortages of fuel and electricity, spiraling prices and a lack of jobs mean the lives of its residents are far from unscathed....
